Accuracy and Fluidity.
Team Play and Individual skills.
Grace and Power.
The summersault, when the ball slams into the back of the net.
When the magic of it all comes with a pair of keyboards or joysticks, it's just hard to resist.

The latest edition in FIFA series is the fastest selling sports game ever. FIFA 11 has received high critical acclaim 'One of the most refined, polished and compelling takes on the beautiful game and arguably of any given sport'. Fast paced and with various skills and tricks to be mastered, this game has been a regular at gaming events since release. Football is commonly known as the most-loved sport in the world and all the soul and passion for the game is translated into FIFA. Though games are short - they are competitive and fun to watch even by non-gamers - which have ledto a big turnout each time. Score the most goals and kick your way to victory at this Blitzkrieg!

1. Registration fee is Rs. 50/- per participant. Tathva registration is compulsory.Registration will be closed after prelims.
2. All games will be Classic 1 vs 1 using multiplayer LAN.
3. There will be no practicing allowed. Participants are only allowed tochange the necessary controls and check them.
4. Joysticks and other game controllers will not be provided, but areallowed.
5. The total number of rounds will be decided by the participation.
6. All rounds will follow usual knockout procedure.
7. In case of a draw, the match is restarted with the golden goal rule (Same teams must be selected).
8. In case of un- intentional disconnection, the admin will decide on how to proceed. In the game is within half-time and no goals have been scored, the game will be restarted with same teams for a full-time game. If not, the game will be played for the remaining time based on at what time it disconnected with scores being carried over.
9. If at any time, a player intentionally disconnects/exits the game he/she will be disqualified. In case of alt-tabbing - the admin will decide whether it was intentional or a mistake and what action must be taken with disqualification being the maximum penalty.
10. Teams can be either clubs or countries according to user's will.
11. The first and second rounds will be classic 4 minute half timematches. The rest will all be 6 minute ones. Final match will be made a best of three.
12. The administrator's decision will be final.
